docna.cdata!:
India - Kerala Social Forestry Project :
            Credit 1514 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Kerala Social Forestry
            Project : Credit 1514 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
India - Kerala Social Forestry Project :
            Credit 1514 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Kerala Social Forestry
            Project : Credit 1514 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Kerala Social Forestry Project will
            increase supplies of fuelwood, small timber and poles
            through the establishment of about 85,000 ha of plantations.
            It will also execute a pilot program for producing medicinal
            plants and strengthen the institutional capabilities through
            provision for training of existing personnel; additional
            staff; investment in research and additional vehicles and
            equipment. A wood balance study will also be undertaken.
